body:
http://imgur.com/hPonSWo
^my skin 

so i edited the skin that I had on Novaskin and then when i reuploaded it to minecraft the outer layer of the head isnt working! 

then i tried it on minersneedcoolshoes and it still doesnt have the outer layer when i upload it to minecraft.net

ive been trying to fix this for like an hour and a half and im desperate so if anybody knows what i can do, please help!
body_tagged:
http://imgur.com/hPonSWo
^my skin 

so i edited the skin that I had on Novaskin and then when i reuploaded it to minecraft the outer layer of the head isnt working!

ive been trying to fix this for like an hour and a half and im desperate so if anybody knows what i can do, please help!
title: No skin outer layer, please help :(

replies.body: So you want to add a outer layer to your current skin?
replies.body_tagged: So you want to add a outer layer to your current skin?

replies.body: well it already has an outer layer this is what its supposed to look like http://www.planetminecraft.com/skin/my-skin-3591638/ but when i upload it to minecraft it doesnt have the outer hair layer
replies.body_tagged: well it already has an outer layer this is what its supposed to look like http://www.planetminecraft.com/skin/my-skin-3591638/ but when i upload it to minecraft it doesnt have the outer hair layer

replies.body:
Hmm make sure you haven't toggled any of your layers. It could be that you've turned off your hat layer

In minecraft, go to Options > Skin Customization. Make sure everything is ON.
replies.body_tagged:
Hmm make sure you haven't toggled any of your layers. It could be that you've turned off your hat layer

In minecraft, go to Options > Skin Customization. Make sure everything is ON.
